暈遊戲，退了一次。後來夏促又買回來。燒腦系列……

There's a good reason this game is rated OVERWHELMINGLY POSITIVE. It's "Not your typical video game". Everyone loves pros/cons so here we go.


Cons:
It's not free, but at $4.99 during the summer sales, it feels like it's free.

Pros:

Learning Builds at a steady pace. Just when you think you've figured out everything with portals, they show you you haven't.

Makes you feel smart when you complete a level.

Cave Johnson/GLaDOS/Wheatley are all interwined perfectly. It feels like each one had their own writer. Since you are Chell, she doesn't have much dialog which is cool because you inject your own feelings into the character that you are playing as making it more immersive.

Unique, campy story. 


You'd like this if you like:
Puzzles
The Venture Bros
James Bond
Being Alive

You won't like this if:
You  have video games.
Hate Life.

Íncrível!! Um dos melhores jogos que tive a oportunidade de jogar. Muitíssimo inteligente e com desafios bem elaborados.
A jogabilidade e os gráficos são muito bons. Até mesmo em 2015 não deixam fazem feio frente aos games do ano. O som é excelente. Quem tiver 5 canais vai curtir muito apesar de não ser essencial.
Agora a GLADOS... Oh my... Ela é o SHOW do jogo. A ESTRELA-MOR. O nome do jogo podia ser GLADOS pois seria algo mais que justo. No jogo não há diálogos mas somente monólogos dela para com o jogador. É incrível como um texto bem redigido pode construir uma história tão interessante e HILÁRIA. A Glados tem um senso de humor sarcástico fabulosamente afiado. Impossível não rir com as ironias dela.
Enfim, recomendo demais esse jogo. Nao é a toa que é o jogo mais avaliações positivas dentro da Steam.
Шедевр с большой буквы. В этой игре есть отличный сюжет. отличные головоломки и даже эпичность,а так же история метаморфоза бессердечного робота. ШЕДЕВР

Portal 2 is an overall fantastic game. The singleplayer is quite addictive, and I found myself finishing it in one sitting without standing up. It's quite a puzzler, and it allows an enjoyable experience as you listen to the funny dialogue throughout. The co-op is best played with a friend, and it is no doubt a very fun gamemode. To spice it up a bit, there are some community test chambers, as well as a test chamber construction system that allows you to design your own puzzling course. This may be one of my favorite games of all time, and deserves the overwhelmingly positive rating it has. This game was more hyped than Fallout 4, and it promised to deliver an amazing experience. We were not disappointed with the final product. With the gaming community having what they want, it brings the love for the franchise even higher. I recommend this game to anyone, whether you love the Portal series or not.

I really recommend this great piece of art to anyone who has the money to get it. This game has and unlimited amount of awesome puzzles and many co-op abilitys. 
The best thing is how FUN IT IS!!!!!!!!!!:D

Eu paricularmente não curto muito ogos de puzzel porem esse jogo vai alem de só isso ...

La secuela de Portal; Portal 2. Nos ofrece un estilo de juego similar al de su antecesor, con mapas mas amplios y detallados, animaciones de gran calidad.
Sin mencionar de la continuación de la historia del primer juego, y la respuesta a que pasó con GLaDOS...
Nota: Los dialogos de GLaDOS ingeniosos y frios como siempre, sin duda una joya a la altura de su predecesor.

Il gioco è bello e il concept interessante.
Io, se l'avessi saputo, l'avrei giocato a piccole dosi, dato che alla lunga stanca.
Visto il prezzo quasi ridicolo (soprattutto in periodo di saldi), lo considero un must-buy.
Con un amico è una delle cose più divertenti e soddisfacenti fatta ultimamente.

This game is fucking amazing. The puzzles make you think and when you solve them, it results into you feeling like a fucking retard. You know you're desperate when you look up the level on youtube and once you've finally see what you had to do to complete that part of the level it just leads into a face palm. All the little functions that come along with the game are simply phenominal. I personally find it hilarious to remove my parters head off and run away jumping to my death so that he can not do the same. Which just wastes time but its filled with laughs. Dancing while Chell is calling you a malfunctioning idiotic robot just to spite her you continue to dance and kill yourself constantly. But the best part is when you complete a level and sigh in happiness that it took you 30 mininutes to complete a level that takes 10, because you wanted to enjoy the game for all the little tools and things you can do along side one of your closest friends. Personally a smash hit and I RECOMMEND THIS!!!

wow...just... what can be said about this game that's not good? NOTHING! This is by far my  favourite game of ALL TIME.. but enough with the bla bla's, let's just cut  to the review:

PROS:

-Awesome puzzels(if you like your brain to hurt)


-AMAZING co-op mode..it's really fun to play with your friends,and to solve  tests together. one of the best features in portal 2..

-AWESOME story..now this is what I really like about this game.. the story isn't  such a big deal until  [spoiler] you get to the massive plot twist half way through the game... man,that really makes me sad... the ending to the game is also wel..sad... one of the best endings I've ever seen... just play the game and you will know what I mean...  [/spoiler]  

-SOUNDTRACK-..the soundtrack is really good!  it's really fun to listen to while you are solving puzzels! 

-SIZE- the game is very large, and is TOTALLY worth ALL the money (not being sarcastic,duuuh)

-MECANICS-mecanics in this game are awesome! i've never seen any puzzle games with this many mecanics... 

-COMMUNITY MADE TEST CHAMBERS- there's a LOT of community-made tests, which just makes the game EVEN LONGER..

wow...that was a long one... (lol) but all this had to be said!!

CONS:

-ERROR:NO CONS TO WRITE
-ERROR:NO CONS TO WRITE
-ERROR:NO CONS TO WRITE
-ERROR:NO CONS TO WRITE

FINAL RATING: 10/10!! If you like puzzles, rich story,fun co-op,and everything mentioned above... THIS GAME IS FOR YOU!!!!

Play the first Portal entry before you play this one! You won't appreciate the first game if you don't as it's still a true classic.

Portal 2 takes everything that makes the original title so amazing, and expands. This game is everything in the first game, but more, and with loads of bells and whistles to make it a brand new installment, and leaves just as big an impact; which is remarkable considering that Portal broke many boundaries itself. Innovation is a good way of describing this game. 
With more, cleverly designed puzzles, a greater story, and even more memorable characters, this is an absolute must for any Steam owner. 
A virtually flawless game with tonnes of content besides the main story, with a Co-op, a test chamber workshop, you'll have plenty of hours of fun with this one! Valve truely outdid themselves with this title. Buy it now!

Viel zu kurz 6h -.-
Excellent game with amazing story and great replay value.

Absolutely stunning. A unique concept, with unique characters, combined with an excellent execution equals to one of the greatest video games ever made. What's even more impressive is that Portal 2 manages to solve a problem plaguing many puzzle games - replayability. The incredibly active community will basically continue flooding you with content every time you play, enough to keep you busy for many, many hours after you've completed the main story.

Unless you absolutely HATE puzzle games with passion, not owning this game is borderline sinful.

best game ever portal logic

Great first-person problem solving game using physics, enough new items added in to stop it being to similar to the first game. 
-Game length is arround 7hours if your casual playing it, can be done much quicker. 
-tasks have enough new elements to them so they don't get to repetitive, same with story mode changing environment enough so you don't get to bored of the same surroundings.
-Tasks actually involve thinking about the problem, some felt like a brain trainning exercise. 
-Feature for community maps and even co-op maps can keep the game interesting(although co-op without an actual friend can be hard to find as community is low)
-Great voice acting to keep you interested.
<3 Valve <3

Super Spiel! Portal hat sich deutlich weiter entwickelt, das Spielprinzip ist natürlich das selbe, aber die Aufmachung gefällt mir um ein vielfaches besser als bei dem ersten Teil. Die Atmosphäre ist nicht mehr so kühl und ich fand es jetzt in den ersten 7 Leveln schon viel witziger als den ganzen ersten Teil.

非常好玩，强力推荐。
很喜欢社区实验室的功能，能玩到很到好玩的地图，当然也可以自己设计，不过很费精力就是了。
联机模式现在只玩了几次，如果有好基友一起玩最好，很有意思。
挑战模式玩的不多，就是以最短的时间和最少的传送门过各个剧情里的实验室，这会逼着你改进你的过关方法。
我一个好友里用2个传送门和21秒过了实验室几我忘了，但是我至少要4个门，至今没想明白。
Juegazo. Aunque no te gusten los puzzles te vas a enamorar igualmente asi que mas aun en ofertas es compra obligatoria.
好玩不腻，值得拥有！就是玩时间长容易晕！

A fun game that can keep you guessing, even after you finished a play through with all the different puzzles the game has to offer. The main game is fun to enjoy and when you add in the co op and the player made missions, it can go on for as long as you like. And even after you haven't played it for a while, some of the main missions can stump you all over again (sometimes even if you go through the whole game again after just finishing it).

Portal 2 in a word is magnificent. While Portal 2 isn't that difficult of a game, the dialogue was hilarious. If you're looking for a funny game with great game mechanics, but not much of a puzzle, this game is a good game for you. Personally, I wish it was more challenging. 8/10
